statements: SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT id, topic FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE date='2022-06-15'
SELECT topic, time FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE id=3
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE topic LIKE '%Math%'
SELECT id, date, time, topic FROM virtual_classroom_sessions ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE id = 1;
SELECT date, topic FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE date >= '2023-06-01' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT id, topic FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE topic LIKE '%Science%' AND date = '2023-08-15' ORDER BY topic ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-12-31' AND topic LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT topic, time FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE time > '15:00:00' ORDER BY time ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions;
SELECT topic, date, time FROM virtual_classroom_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, topic FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE time >= '10:00:00';
SELECT * FROM attendees;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees ORDER BY attendee_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT session_id, date, time FROM virtual_classroom_sessions ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC;
SELECT attendee_name, email FROM attendees WHERE attendee_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions JOIN attendees ON virtual_classroom_sessions.session_id = attendees.session_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_sessions FROM virtual_classroom_sessions;
SELECT * FROM classroom_sessions ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT session_id, topic FROM classroom_sessions WHERE start_time > '09:00:00';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students JOIN instructors ON students.email = instructors.email;
SELECT topic, date, start_time, end_time FROM classroom_sessions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM classroom_sessions WHERE date >= '2022-09-01'
SELECT topic, start_time, end_time FROM classroom_sessions WHERE topic LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM students WHERE last_name = 'Smith' OR first_name = 'Emily'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM instructors ORDER BY last_name, first_name
SELECT session_id, date, topic FROM classroom_sessions WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-10-01' AND '2022-10-31' ORDER BY date
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms;
SELECT id, topic FROM virtual_classrooms ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT teacher_name, assignment_title FROM teachers JOIN class_assignments ON teachers.teacher_id = class_assignments.teacher_id;
SELECT date, time, topic FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE topic LIKE '%math%';
SELECT student_name FROM students WHERE virtual_classroom_id = 2 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT id, date, time, topic FROM virtual_classrooms;
SELECT student_name, topic FROM students JOIN virtual_classrooms ON students.virtual_classroom_id = virtual_classrooms.id;
SELECT teacher_name, assignment_title FROM teachers JOIN class_assignments ON teachers.teacher_id = class_assignments.teacher_id;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classrooms WHERE date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT topic, COUNT(*) AS student_count FROM students JOIN virtual_classrooms ON students.virtual_classroom_id = virtual_classrooms.id GROUP BY topic;
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE session_id = 1;
SELECT start_time, end_time, topic FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM instructors ORDER BY instructor_name DESC;
SELECT classroom_id, capacity FROM classrooms WHERE location = 'Room A';
SELECT * FROM virtual_classroom_sessions;
SELECT session_id, topic, date FROM virtual_classroom_sessions WHERE date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name, email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC, student_id DESC;
SELECT classroom_id, location, capacity FROM classrooms WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY location;

SELECT session_id, student_name, attendance_status FROM virtual_classroom_sessions JOIN attendance ON virtual_classroom_sessions.session_id = attendance.session_id JOIN students ON students.student_id = attendance.student_id;
